analysis.description:
PrymexPreICOCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x0dae0a0d130f053fe4bbbec4927539e5f06d2684.sol#298-313) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x0dae0a0d130f053fe4bbbec4927539e5f06d2684.sol#308-309)

PrymexPreICOCrowdsale.closeAndTransferTokenOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x0dae0a0d130f053fe4bbbec4927539e5f06d2684.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(owner,toMint) (/unique_contracts/0x0dae0a0d130f053fe4bbbec4927539e5f06d2684.sol)
